p: Future climate prediction is based on the scenarios considering the emissions of greenhouse gases and aerosols. Representative Concentration Pathways (RCPs) is a new scenario developed in the IPCC’s (Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change’s) Fifth Assessment Report, and it was used as climate scenarios, including RCP2.6, RCP4.5, RCP6.0 and RCP8.5 [ 40, 41]. The selected climate scenario model was based on the interpolated, revised results of five sets of global climate scenarios (GFDL-ESM2M, HADGEM2-ES, IPSL-CM5A-LR, MIROC-ESM-CHEM and NORESM1-M) [ 42, 43] provided by the Inter-Sectoral Impact Model Intercomparison Project (ISI-MIP).
